018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
022
023import org.apiguardian.api.API;
024import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.svg.type.SVGPreserveAspectRatio;
027import jakarta.activation.MimeType;
028
029/**
030 *  <p>{@summary The definition of the SVG element
031 *  <code>&lt;svg&gt;</code>.}</p>
032 *  <p>The <code>&lt;svg&gt;</code> element is the root element for any SVG
033 *  document, either stand-alone (in a file with the {@code *.svg} extension)
034 *  or embedded in an HTML file (or elsewhere - including another SVG
035 *  document). Therefore the definition for the namespaces is different for
036 *  each usage. This is reflected by the type
037 *  {@link Usage}.</p>
038 *
039 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
040 *  @version $Id: SVG.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $
041 *  @since 0.0.5
042 *
043 *  @see "https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/single-page.html#struct-SVGElement"
044 */
045@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVG.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $" )
046@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
047public interface SVG extends SVGElementWithChildren, AllowsConditionalProcessingAttributes, AllowsDocumentEventAttributes, AllowsDocumentElementEventAttributes, AllowsGraphicalEventAttributes, AllowsPresentationAttributes, AllowsStyleAttributes
048{
049        /*---------------*\
050    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
051        \*---------------*/
052    /**
053     *  The different usages for an {@code <svg>} element.
054     *
055     *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
056     *  @version $Id: SVG.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $
057     *  @since 0.0.5
058     */
059    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVG.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $" )
060    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
061    public static enum Usage
062    {
063            /*------------------*\
064        ====** Enum Declaration **=============================================
065            \*------------------*/
066        /**
067         *  The {@code <svg>} element is used as the root for a stand-alone
068         *  document.
069         */
070        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
071        STANDALONE_DOCUMENT,
072
073        /**
074         *  The {@code <svg>} element will be embedded into HTML (but not
075         *  HTML&nbsp;5 - see
076         *  {@link #EMBED_HTML5}).
077         */
078        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
079        EMBED_HTML,
080
081        /**
082         *  The {@code <svg>} element will be embedded into HTML&nbsp;5; as
083         *  SVG is somehow part of the definition of HTML&nbsp;5, no further
084         *  namespace declarations are required.
085         */
086        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
087        EMBED_HTML5,
088
089        /**
090         *  The {@code <svg>} element will be embedded into another
091         *  {@code <svg>} element.
092         */
093        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
094        EMBED_SVG
095    }
096    //  enum Usage
097
098        /*---------*\
099    ====** Methods **==========================================================
100        \*---------*/
101    /**
102     *  Adds a child to the definitions of this {@code <svg>} element.
103     *
104     *  @param  <E> The implementation type for the {@code children}.
105     *  @param  child   The child to add.
106     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given child is not valid to be
107     *      added to a {@code <defs>} element, or it does not have an id.
108     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The child has already a parent that is
109     *      not this element.
110     */
111    public <E extends SVGElement> void addDefinition( final E child ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException;
112
113    /**
114     *  Adds an SVG {@code <style>} element to the definitions of this
115     *  {@code <svg>} element. If there exists already a {@code <style>}
116     *  element, the new one will be merged into the existing one.
117     *
118     *  @param  style   The style to add.
119     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The child has already a parent that is
120     *      not this element.
121     */
122    public void addStyle( final SVGStyle style ) throws IllegalStateException;
123
124    /**
125     *  Sets the default scripting language used to process the type strings
126     *  in event attributes. This language must be used for all instances of
127     *  script that do not specify their own scripting language.<br>
128     *  <br>The type specifies a media type as a MIME document identifier; the
129     *  default type is {@code application/ecmascript}.
130     *
131     *  @param  value   The default scripting language for this {@code <svg>}
132     *      element.
133     */
134    public void setContentScriptType( final MimeType value );
135
136    /**
137     *  Sets the dimension for this {@code <svg>} element.
138     *
139     *  @param  width   The width of the element.
140     *  @param  height  The height of the element.
141     */
142    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
143    public default void setDimension( final SVGNumber width, final SVGNumber height )
144    {
145        setHeight( requireNonNullArgument( height, "height" ) );
146        setWidth( requireNonNullArgument( width, "width" ) );
147    }   //  setDimension()
148
149    /**
150     *  Sets the height of the embedded {@code <svg>} element.
151     *
152     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
153     *      attribute will be removed.
154     */
155    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
156    public void setHeight( final SVGNumber value );
157
158    /**
159     *  Sets the mode for the aspect ratio preservation for this {@code <svg>}
160     *  element.
161     *
162     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
163     *      attribute will be removed.
164     */
165    public void setPreserveAspectRatio( final SVGPreserveAspectRatio value );
166
167    /**
168     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given CSS style definitions as a style sheet in
169     *  an SVG {@code style} element to the <code>&lt;defs&gt;</code> element
170     *  of this <code>&lt;svg&gt;</code> element.}</p>
171     *  <p>This is <i>not</i> an attribute; instead an SVG {@code <style}
172     *  element will be created.</p>
173     *  <p>Consecutive calls to this method will not create additional
174     *  {@code <style>} elements, instead the new styles will be added to the
175     *  existing ones.</p>
176     *
177     *  @param  styles  The CSS style definitions.
178     *  @return The SVG {@code <style>} element with the style sheet
179     *      definitions.
180     */
181    public SVGStyle setStyleSheet( final CharSequence... styles );
182
183    /**
184     *  Defines the visible area in this SVG drawing area.
185     *
186     *  @param  x   The x coordinate of top left corner of the area.
187     *  @param  y   The y coordinate of top left corner of the area.
188     *  @param  width   The width of the area.
189     *  @param  height  The height of the area.
190     */
191    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
192    public void setViewBox( final SVGNumber x, final SVGNumber y, final SVGNumber width, final SVGNumber height );
193
194    /**
195     *  Sets the width of the embedded {@code <svg>} element.
196     *
197     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
198     *      attribute will be removed.
199     */
200    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
201    public void setWidth( final SVGNumber value );
202
203    /**
204     *  Sets the x coordinate for the top left corner of the embedded
205     *  {@code <svg>} element.
206     *
207     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
208     *      attribute will be removed.
209     */
210    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
211    public void setX( final SVGNumber value );
212
213    /**
214     *  Sets the y coordinate for the top left corner of the embedded
215     *  {@code <svg>} element.
216     *
217     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
218     *      attribute will be removed.
219     */
220    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
221    public void setY( final SVGNumber value );
222
223    /**
224     *  Sets the 'Zoom-and-Pan' flag; if enabled on a stand-alone instance of
225     *  the {@code <svg>} element, it allows panning and zooming the image.
226     *
227     *  @param  flag    {@code true} enables the feature by setting
228     *      &quot;{@code magnify}&quot; to the attribute
229     *      {@value SVGUtils#SVGATTRIBUTE_ZoomAndPan}, {@code false} disables
230     *      it by setting the attribute to &quot;{@code disable}&quot;.
231     */
232    public void setZoomAndPan( final boolean flag );
233}
234//  interface SVG
235
236/*
237 *  End of File
238 */
